dublin_core.dcvalue: The Safer Deliveries program integrates novel mHealth approaches -- decision support, data storage, mobile banking, and communications -- into a community intervention that effectively links the institutional and community levels to overcome barriers to hospital deliveries in Zanzibar.
CHW, Public sector health system (national, regional, district)
Marc Mitchell, President, D-tree International, Email: mmitchel@hsph.harvard.edu
Data collection and reporting, Electronic decision support, Electronic health records, Financial transactions and incentives, Registries and vital events tracking, Maternal health, Newborn health
